mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM APP_USER A
and A.ID IN ( select STAFF_ID from STAFF_TASK A1 WHERE A1.ORDER_ID=#{orderId} and exists ( select 1 from STAFF_JOB A1,STAFF_ROLE B1 WHERE A1.ROLE_ID=B1.ID AND A1.STAFF_ID=A.ID AND B1.ID=2 ) )
and A.ID IN ( SELECT A1.STAFF_ID FROM STAFF_JOB A1 JOIN STAFF_ROLE B1 ON B1.ID=A1.ROLE_ID AND B1.ID=1 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE A1.REGION_ID=#{regionId} UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM PUB_REGION A2 WHERE A2.ID=#{regionId} AND A1.REGION_ID=A2.SUPER_ID UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM PUB_REGION A2 JOIN PUB_REGION A3 ON A3.SUPER_ID=A2.ID WHERE A3.ID=#{regionId} AND A1.REGION_ID=A2.SUPER_ID ) )
and A.ID IN ( SELECT A1.STAFF_ID FROM STAFF_JOB A1 JOIN STAFF_ROLE B1 ON B1.ID=A1.ROLE_ID AND B1.ID=2 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE A1.REGION_ID=#{regionId} UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM PUB_REGION A2 WHERE A2.ID=#{regionId} AND A1.REGION_ID=A2.SUPER_ID UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM PUB_REGION A2 JOIN PUB_REGION A3 ON A3.SUPER_ID=A2.ID WHERE A3.ID=#{regionId} AND A1.REGION_ID=A2.SUPER_ID ) )
and 1=2
and LOCATE(#{search}, A.NAME)>0
LIMIT ${page.start},${page.size}
